albums.title: Demons
albums.author: Imagine Dragons
albums.description: Demons is the fourth single from Imagine Dragons' debut album, Night Visions, and the lead track for the band's Demons (Remixes) - EP.

albums.title: Enemy
albums.author: Imagine Dragons
albums.description: Enemy is the lead single and fifth track for League of Legends' inaugural animated series, Arcane.

albums.title: Counting Stars
albums.author: One Republic
albums.description: The first track on OneRepublic's third studio album Native, Counting Stars was inspired by lead singer Ryan Tedder's writing sessions with Beyonce in the Hamptons.

albums.title: Run
albums.author: One Republic
albums.description: The first track on OneRepublic's third studio album Native, Counting Stars was inspired by lead singer Ryan Tedder's writing sessions with Beyonce in the Hamptons.
